price: Nokorε sε me nua woi, ͻwͻ nnwan bedeε aduͻkron-nkoron, εna menso me wͻ odwan bedeε baako. Ͻse menfa (medeε baako no nso) mma no, na n’ano yε den wͻ kasa mu kyεn me”.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِي لَهُۥ تِسۡعٞ وَتِسۡعُونَ نَعۡجَةٗ وَلِيَ نَعۡجَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَقَالَ أَكۡفِلۡنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي ٱلۡخِطَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā akhī lahu tis'ʿun watis'ʿūna naʿjatan waliya naʿjatun wāḥidatun faqāla akfil'nīhā waʿazzanī fī al-khiṭābi
